A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It would take too long to go over everything this movie did wrong\, so I'm going to go over what it did right.  Almost nothing.  Perhaps little kids\, people who think \"love unites everyone\,\" and people focused on how \"unequal\" society is will like it\, but anyone who desires a good star wars movie\, or just a star wars movie\, is going to be deeply disappointed.  RIP Star Wars\, 1977 - 2017.
